casebody.data:
Helms
v.
Thomas 2018-0731 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 21, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion for admission pro hac vice of Edward D. Plato. Motion granted. Pursuant to Gov.BarR. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission to appear pro hac vice with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
